items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

items.name: Kalandra's Touch
flavourText: On one hand, you have a choice.
On the other, you have its twin.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location. It will then fire projectiles out in all directions from that point, which will travel for a short time before disappearing.
explicitMods: Converts 60% of Physical Damage to a random Element
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. There is a maximum of 50 Resonance for each Element. Cannot support triggered skills, instant skills, orb skills, brands, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods:
Hits with Supported Skills for which the highest Damage Type is Elemental cause you to gain 25 Resonance of other Elements per second for 2 seconds
Lose 5 Resonance per second of each Element you are not gaining
Supported Skills deal 3% more Elemental Damage per 5 of lowest Resonance
Supported Skills penetrate 17% Elemental Resistances while each Resonance is at least 25
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Elemental Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 34% reduced Mana Cost
Supported Skills have 20% increased Critical Strike Chance

Gain an Inspiration Charge when you Spend Mana on Upfront
Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 800 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.baseType: Awakened Elemental Damage with Attacks Support

Elemental Damage from Supported Skills cannot be Reflected
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills, making their projectiles fork into two projectiles the first two times they hit an enemy and don't pierce it.
explicitMods: Projectiles from Supported Skills Fork an additional Time
Supported Skills deal 14% more Projectile Damage
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Projectile Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Goldwyrm
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: 1.2% of Attack Physical Damage Leeched as Life
You take 4% of your Maximum Life per second as Physical Damage
You take 4% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Physical Damage
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +24% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems

explicitMods: 10% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 38 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 528 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts a buff that grants different bonuses to melee skills depending on your stance. Using the skill again alternates between Blood Stance and Sand Stance.
explicitMods: Melee Skills deal 15% more Area Damage while in Blood Stance
Melee Skills have 5% less Area of Effect while in Blood Stance
Melee Skills have 15% more Area of Effect while in Sand Stance
Melee Skills deal 5% less Area Damage while in Sand Stance
20% increased Projectile Attack Damage while in Blood Stance
20% increased Projectile Speed while in Sand Stance

implicitMods: Adds 9 to 16 Physical Damage to Attacks
explicitMods: Adds 15 to 23 Physical Damage to Attacks
+32% to Critical Strike Multiplier with Bows
Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow

items.name: Divination Distillate
explicitMods: 11% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

items.name: Sadima's Touch
implicitMods: Attacks have +0.7% to Critical Strike Chance
explicitMods: Adds 4 to 8 Fire Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
flavourText: Wealth unspent is wealth wasted.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies Regenerate 193.2 Life per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a series of quick teleports towards a targeted location. If using the "Attack in Place" option, the direction is reversed. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified

items.name: Greed's Embrace
flavourText: Some would question if the risk was worth it.
The rest were already dead.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 25% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby allies deal 18% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.

You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which lets you deal more physical damage. When you kill an enemy while you have this buff, this skill will summon a Sentinel of Purity, or refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them. The Sentinels of Purity have a single-target melee attack and an area melee attack.
explicitMods: Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Kill an Enemy
20% chance to Summon a Sentinel of Purity when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
Minions have 11% chance to Taunt on Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 45% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 141% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, this skill will cause them to explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. This damage is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.
explicitMods: Buff grants 40 to 61 Added Attack Cold Damage
Buff grants 40 to 61 Added Spell Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 28% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

craftedMods: 30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.
